document.masterDocTitle: World Catalogue of the Druid Flies (Diptera: Schizophora: Clusiidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: World Catalogue of the Druid Flies (Diptera: Schizophora: Clusiidae)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Peratochetus
Rondani 1856 : 119
. Type species,
Perotachetus lutescens Rondani 1856
, by original designation [=
flava Meigen
]. Gender masculine.
Rondani 1863 : 96
[index], 1875: 250 [redescription, key];
Marschall 1873 : 341
[nomenclator];
Scudder 1882 : 253
[nomenclator, attributed to Rondani (1868—specific publication unknown)], 1884: 237 [nomenclator];
Schulze et al . 1934
: 2577
[nomenclator];

[nomenclator];
Soós 1984 : 13
[synonymy with
Clusia
- previous genus name synonymies misspelled as
Peratochaetus
].

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 3. Wings of Cecidomyiidae (including galls) and Clusiidae from Handlirsch (1884), including
Clusia tigrina (Fallén)
(fig. 9),
Clusia flava (Meigen)
(fig. 10),
Apiochaeta philippii (Rondani)
(fig. 11), and
Clusiodes pictipes
(Zetterstedt)
(fig. 12).
